original_text: Now Jesus had not yet entered the village, but was still at the place where Martha had met him.
korean_text: 예수는 아직 마을로 들어오지 아니하시고 마르다가 맞이했던 곳에 그대로 계시더라

sentences.original_text: Now Jesus had not yet entered the village
but was still at the place

sentences.korean_translation: 마르다가 그를 만났던 바로 그 곳이었습니다
